sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>ecc_queue</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="ecc_queue">agentSTARTSWITHmid.server.^queue=output^EQ<item endquery="false" field="agent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="mid.server."/><item display_value="output" endquery="false" field="queue" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="output"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>MID Server Cluster - Copy orig MID name</name><order>1</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    // KEEP THE NAME OF THE ORIG AGENT
    current.u_orig_agent = current.agent;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-27 10:45:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>374776d5070d9050409ff4218c1ed0fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MID Server Cluster - Copy orig MID name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_374776d5070d9050409ff4218c1ed0fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-28 09:37:51</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=374776d5070d9050409ff4218c1ed0fc"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_documentation_ecc_queue_u_orig_agent_en
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_documentation element="u_orig_agent" label="Agent (orig)" language="en" table="ecc_queue"><sys_documentation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>u_orig_agent</element><help/><hint/><label>Agent (orig)</label><language>en</language><name>ecc_queue</name><plural>Agent (orig)</plural><sys_class_name>sys_documentation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-27 09:27:49</sys_created_on><sys_id>c775ae5907899050409ff4218c1ed0ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Agent (orig)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_documentation_ecc_queue_u_orig_agent_en</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-27 09:28:25</sys_updated_on><url/><url_target/></sys_documentation></sys_documentation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_5909265d07899050409ff4218c1ed056
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>ecc_queue</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="ecc_queue">agentSTARTSWITHmid.server.^queue=input^topic=JDBCProbeCompleted^EQ<item endquery="false" field="agent" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="mid.server."/><item display_value="input" endquery="false" field="queue" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="input"/><item endquery="false" field="topic" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="JDBCProbeCompleted"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>MID Server Cluster - Restore MID name</name><order>1111</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    // copy back the orig agent value

    if (gs.nil(current.response_to))
        return;

	// look up the orig outbound message
    var gr = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
    if (gr.get(current.getValue('response_to'))) {

        if (!gs.nil(gr.u_orig_agent)) {
            // keep the processing mid server for reference
            current.setValue('u_orig_agent', current.getValue('agent'));
			
			// copy back the name of the init mid server
			current.setValue('agent', gr.getValue('u_orig_agent'));
        }
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-27 09:43:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5909265d07899050409ff4218c1ed056</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MID Server Cluster - Restore MID name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5909265d07899050409ff4218c1ed056</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-07-01 07:05:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5909265d07899050409ff4218c1ed056"/></record_update>
